ReportItemSet.ReportItem: {getText(RP_CATALYST_APPLICATION,INFORMATION,FILE_NUMBER,0,{$user_id},0)} - {$user_last_name} {round({divide({get(q1)},{get(nReviewers)})},2)} {round({divide({get(q2)},{get(nReviewers)})},2)} {round({divide({get(q3)},{get(nReviewers)})},2)} {round({divide({get(q4)},{get(nReviewers)})},2)} {round({divide({get(q5)},{get(nReviewers)})},2)} {round({divide({get(q6)},{get(nReviewers)})},2)} {round({divide({get(q7)},{get(nReviewers)})},2)} {round({divide({get(q8)},{get(nReviewers)})},2)} {get(total)}
